title: Tri-Series in Sri Lanka 2018 Scoreboard
text: March 14, 2018 / 4:56 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago Tri-Series in Sri Lanka 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Mar 14 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of match 5 between Bangladesh and India on Wednesday at Colombo, Sri Lanka India win by 17 runs India 1st innings Rohit Sharma Run Out Rubel Hossain 89 Shikhar Dhawan b Rubel Hossain 35 Suresh Raina c Soumya Sarkar b Rubel Hossain 47 Dinesh Karthik Not Out 2 Extras 0b 1lb 0nb 0pen 2w 3 Total (20.0 overs) 176-3 Fall of Wickets : 1-70 Dhawan, 2-172 Raina, 3-176 Sharma Did Not Bat : Rahul, Pandey, Sundar, Shankar, Siraj, Thakur, Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Abu Hider 4 0 43 0 10.75 1w Nazmul Islam 4 0 27 0 6.75 Rubel Hossain 4 0 27 2 6.75 Mustafizur Rahman 4 0 38 0 9.50 Mehedi Hasan 3 0 31 0 10.33 1w Mahmudullah 1 0 9 0 9.00 Bangladesh 1st innings Tamim Iqbal b Washington Sundar 27 Liton Das st Dinesh Karthik b Washington Sundar 7 Soumya Sarkar b Washington Sundar 1 Mushfiqur Rahim Not Out 72 Mahmudullah c Lokesh Rahul b Yuzvendra Chahal 11 Sabbir Rahman b Shardul Thakur 27 Mehedi Hasan c Suresh Raina b Mohammed Siraj 7 Extras 0b 1lb 1nb 0pen 5w 7 Total (20.0 overs) 159-6 Fall of Wickets : 1-12 Das, 2-35 Sarkar, 3-40 Iqbal, 4-61 Mahmudullah, 5-126 Rahman, 6-150 Miraz Did Not Bat : Rony, Hossain, Rahman, Islam Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohammed Siraj 4 0 50 1 12.50 2w 1nb Washington Sundar 4 0 22 3 5.50 1w Shardul Thakur 4 0 37 1 9.25 Yuzvendra Chahal 4 0 21 1 5.25 2w Vijay Shankar 4 0 28 0 7.00 Umpire Ruchira Palliyaguruge Umpire Raja Wimalasiri Video Ranmore Martinesz Match Referee Brian Broad
